title: Akaneiro (01 - 03) (complete) (2013) (- Nem -)
description:
From the brilliant imagination of video game auteur American McGee comes a dazzling reenvisioning of Red Riding Hood set in the wondrous world of Japanese folklore!

A young woman torn between two cultures takes on an epic adventure battling devious yokai for the fate of her world! In this three-issue miniseries.

Based on the hot new game by American McGeeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Spicy Horse Games!

Written by Justin Aclin (Star Wars: The Clone Wars), and illustrated by Vasilis Lolos (Conan the Barbarian)!
